doctor_utters: [ask] How may I help you today?
[ask] Do you have shortness of breath?
[ask] Do you have sore throat, runny nose, or nasal congestion?
[ask] Have you been exposed to any environmental irritants such as smoke, dust, or pollen?
[ask] Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
[ask] Do you have any other symptoms such as chest pain, wheezing, or difficulty breathing?
[ask] Have you been coughing up any sputum?
[ask] Have you been experiencing any fatigue or malaise?
[inform] Based on your description, the most likely diagnosis is Pneumonia.
patient_utters: Yes, I have been coughing up blood.
Yes, I have been feeling fatigued.
